title: Amazon KDP Tutorial for Beginners – Keyword Research That Works (2026)
description:
If you’re new to Amazon KDP or struggling to get your books to rank, this Amazon KDP tutorial for beginners will show you how to do keyword research the right way in 2026. In this video, I break down a simple but powerful Amazon KDP keyword strategy that helps you find the right KDP keywords, rank faster, and get more visibility for your books on Amazon.


This step-by-step Amazon KDP tutorial is perfect for beginners and intermediate publishers who want to understand how keyword research works for Kindle Direct Publishing. You’ll learn how to find profitable Amazon KDP keywords, avoid common beginner mistakes, and use keyword research to rank books on Amazon KDP even if you’re just getting started.


Amazon KDP is constantly changing, and the keyword strategy that worked last year may not work in 2026. That’s why this video focuses on updated Amazon KDP keyword research, KDP SEO basics, and how the Amazon KDP algorithm uses keywords to decide which books to show buyers.
